20 //Round everything to whole pixels during rendering.
21 // Helps to avoid artifacts in pixel art games
22 // when using textures with linearFilter="false"
23 // and fractional sprite coordinates or sprite scaling.
24 // Introduces some CPU overhead.
25 //#define OXYGINE_NO_SUBPIXEL_RENDERING 1

93 #define OX_LOG_ERROR(x) if (!(x)) {oxygine::logs::error("Assert! %s in %s:%d", #x, __FILE__, __LINE__);}

96 //assert without logs::error
97 #ifdef OXYGINE_QT
98 # define OX_ASSERT_NL(x) { if (!(x)) __asm("int3"); Q_ASSERT(x);}
99 #elif !OX_DEBUG || EMSCRIPTEN
100 # define OX_ASSERT_NL(x)
101 #else
102 # define OX_ASSERT_NL(x) {assert(x);}
103 #endif
104

106 #if OXYGINE_ASSERT2LOG
